abstract.p: Glenwood-Glen Head Civic Assn president Patrice Benneward and vice president John French letter expresses dismay at opposition by Councilman Anthony D Macagnone, in July 30 letter, to building moratorium in special groundwater protection area in Oyster Bay, NY (S)

block.p: We were dismayed to learn that Councilman Macagnone opposes a temporary moratorium in the special groundwater protection area, and surprised that he apparently thinks the business community would not support such a moratorium. We recently sponsored a meeting of business, residential and environmental leaders in our community, at which it was generally agreed that a moratorium and a comprehensive land use plan are urgently needed.
PATRICE BENNEWARD President JOHN FRENCH Vice President Glenwood-Glen Head Civic Assn. Glenwood Landing
